title: [GAMEPLAY] Slayer Jinx Bugs
body:
My friend and I were playing in an ARAM on Blue Side, he was Slayer Jinx and I was Gentleman Gnar; On my screen, his champion was pretty distorted. There was also some distortion by the shop pad. 
We couldn't completely reproduce the same exact issue, but the same type of graphic error kept happening when one of us was Slayer Jinx.
We also tried reproducing it on Twisted Treeline, but only got slight distortion, or none at all.
[img]http://i.imgur.com/lq5TX4M.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/HLNJQJz.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/SqQkpTX.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/S1bPbyz.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/kFRcHMw.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/egKuxN5.png[/img]

replies.body:
Hey BlueRebellion!  

Thanks for the awesome bug report! ^-^ Images are always super helpful for us to see what's going on. I'll do some digging to see what's going on here.
